title: Epistolary
description: Love bomb. Devalue. Discard.It is the mantra of the Narcissist, but also a pattern of American society.Unbeknownst to letter-writer Mandy Hood, the Grand Canyon births the narcissism of her friend and fellow camp counselor, Gil DeRoquedu. With girlish zeal, Mandy pens the breathtaking scenery and the foibles of counselor life until it comes to an inauspicious end for her.Thirty years later, a chance encounter in a small Pennsylvania town launches Mandy and Gil’s romantic affair. Through emails and shared files rife with gossip, their epistolary relationship heats up until it explodes in a fiery passion with grave consequences to follow.“Descriptions are this authors super power! This story has so many unexpected turns and contains lessons told beyond creatively that involve contemporary tragedies, stark cruelty, and delicious vengeance!” - Randy Miller, goodreads.com
author: Lisa Lambros
